[vc_row row_height_percent=”0″ override_padding=”yes” h_padding=”0″ top_padding=”0″ bottom_padding=”0″ overlay_alpha=”50″ equal_height=”yes” gutter_size=”0″ shift_y=”-5″][vc_column column_width_percent=”95″ position_vertical=”middle” override_padding=”yes” column_padding=”4″ style=”dark” overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”3″ align_medium=”align_center_tablet” medium_width=”0″ align_mobile=”align_center_mobile” shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ width=”1/1″ css=”.vc_custom_1487104202951{padding-right: 25px !important;padding-left: 25px !important;}”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”100″ gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ medium_width=”0″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”-3″ z_index=”0″ width=”1/1″][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”div” text_size=”fontsize-145926″ text_height=”fontheight-524109″ text_font=”font-148806″ text_color=”color-prif” sub_reduced=”yes” css_animation=”alpha-anim” animation_delay=”200″]You have all the data you need to increase revenue, outperform competitors, and drive innovation. The only thing you’re missing is the high-end data science talent necessary to not only analyze, identify, and highlight the most valuable trends within your company’s mass stores of data but also integrate new techniques, like machine learning algorithms and AI solutions, to improve both back-end and front-end experiences.

 

As one of the most demand skill sets, hiring the data science experts you need is rapidly becoming more challenging as salaries continue to rise and the lack of available talent reinforces the candidate-driven market now common to the Tech industry. With access to both active and passive candidates with years of experience analyzing data, developing ML and AI-powered algorithms, engineering effective data architecture within a data warehouse, and more, the skilled talent we place will help elevate your company’s data initiatives and ensure your business remains competitive.

 

Whether you’re looking for a Data Virtualization Engineer with extensive experience in a given platform to improve your data management or qualified Data Scientists to produce the data-driven deliverables you’re lacking, we’ll connect you with the high-end data science talent you need through unparalleled collaboration and unmatched speed.[/vc_custom_heading][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space empty_h=”2″ medium_visibility=”yes” mobile_visibility=”yes”][vc_empty_space empty_h=”1″ desktop_visibility=”yes”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”100″ gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ medium_width=”7″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ css_animation=”bottom-t-top”
